## Lottery.buyPick4Ticket() method

Buy a Pick 4 ticket

**Signature:**

```typescript
buyPick4Ticket(wager: number, options: string, numbers: number[]): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  wager | number | The bet you will be placing. Between 1-500 |
|  options | string |  |
|  numbers | number\[\] | An array of numbers that you are selecting. |

**Returns:**

boolean

True if the ticket was purchased, or false if it was not.

## Remarks

RAM cost: 0 GB

## Example


```ts
// Buy a Pick 3 ticket.
ns.lotto.buyPick4Ticket(500, "box", [0,3,0,3]);
ns.lotto.buyPick4Ticket(500, "straight", [1,1,1,2]);

// Purchase a pick4 ticket as box, straight, and one at random.
```
